name: Wellspring of War-Lust
title: Eula: Wellspring of War-Lust
desc: Flood of frost will ensure that vengeance is mine.
in_play_description: When your Eula, who has this card equipped, uses Icetide Vortex, this will generate 1 more Zeal for Lightfall Sword.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Eula to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Eula, equip this card.
After Eula equips this card, immediately use Glacial Illumination once.
When your Eula, who has this card equipped, uses Icetide Vortex, this will generate 1 more Zeal for Lightfall Sword.
(You must have Eula in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
